abstract: After successfully bidding for all the Bitcoins in the government’s first auction in June, the venture capitalist says he won just one block of 2,000 Bitcoins in Thursday’s sale.
snippet: After successfully bidding for all the Bitcoins in the government’s first auction in June, the venture capitalist says he won just one block of 2,000 Bitcoins in Thursday’s sale.
lead_paragraph: When the United States Marshals Service opened its second Bitcoin auction on Thursday, some bidders were not optimistic about their chances. After all, a single bidder had won all of the nearly 30,000 Bitcoins in the government’s first auction in June, leaving the rest of the participants discouraged.

headline.main: Venture Capitalist Tim Draper Wins Small Piece of Bitcoin Auction
